product_name: L'OrealAge Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Cream
summary: SummaryL'Oreal Paris Midnight Cream with Antioxidants repairs skin barrier to comfort, firm, and smooth wrinkles. Effective for all skin tones.
details: DetailsBenefitsIndulge in the magic of Midnight Cream, an ultra-comforting cream with powerful actives for visible anti-aging results. Repair skin barrier up to 1.5x faster. Tested by dermatologists, suitable for sensitive skin.How It Works- Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Cream with Patented Antioxidant and Vitamin E, repairs the skin barrier at night, when skin is most receptive to recovery - Smooth wrinkles, firm and improve radiance.What is Unique- Midnight Cream has a Wrapping Texture that creates the optimal environment for skin barrier repair. The lightweight, non-greasy cream melts in to skin, infusing it with Antioxidants for healthy looking skin.Visible results- Skin barrier is improved, skin is deeply moisturized and smoothed the next morning. Over time, skin looks firmer, more radiant, revitalized and wrinkles are visibly reduced. Effective for all skin tones.Includes 1 sample - Try our Cell Renewal Anti-Aging Eye Cream, formulated with our Antioxidant Recovery Complex, it targets 5 signs of aging - dark circles, crows feet, bags, puffiness and crepey lids.FeaturesAntioxidants help to prevent aging and support skin's natural renewal process. Vitamin E, an essential nutrient present in the skin, helps to reinforce skin's moisture barrier.Item 2613663How To UseSmooth over face and neck every morning and night after serum or treatment.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Stearyl Alcohol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Peg-20 Stearate, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Panthenol, Silica, Adenosine, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxypropyl Tetrahydropyrantriol, Neohesperidin Dihydrochalcone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Potassium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Tocopherol, Octyldodecanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Propylene Glycol, Trideceth-6, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Ci 14700 / Red 4, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum / Fragrance Fil T296346/1.
how_to_use: Smooth over face and neck every morning and night after serum or treatment.
ingredients: Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I have used so many different high end night creams and never found one that I love as much as this one. It is my new holy grail!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Love the moisture it gives my skin.

reviews.headline: my new favorite moisturizer
reviews.comments: I am obsessed! I have been wanting to try this due to it being a dupe for another brand name product that I love but can no longer afford. It's safe to say that I am never looking back. This works so well with my other skin care and I noticed an all around difference in texture, brightness, and firmness in just over a week. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.headline: Yes love it
reviews.comments: The firming moisture around the eyes

reviews.headline: Luxurious Night Cream
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this night cream. I recently started a night time regimen with this moisturizer. Love everything about it. Creamy texture without feeling heavy. Leaves my face feeling silky and I have noticed a difference in the texture of my skin especially on my neck and chest. This also makes a wonderful nighttime hand cream. After applying to my face I use it on my hands too. I have suffered with extremely dry hands for years and have tried almost every product on the market. L'Oreal really should also package this as a  nighttime hand cream. It's creamy, silky and feels luxurious. My hands, face and neck have never felt this smooth. I would love it if this came in a bigger jar.

reviews.headline: Rosacea skin compatible
reviews.comments: This moisturizer actually works well with my Rosacea. I honestly didn't think this product would work because of the scent but my skin drinks it up. It is a thick moisturizer but it works well.

reviews.headline: Feels great going on and smells good!
reviews.comments: Will purchase again.

reviews.headline: L'OrÃ©al Midnight Cream
reviews.comments: I was gifted a sample in exchange for my honest review. This cream went on smooth and has a great smell. I used overnight and woke up with face feeling soft and hydrated. I am 36, but some maturing for my skin, so found this product to be helpful.

reviews.headline: Not sure on this one.
reviews.comments: Ive been using Loreal Revitalift and I love it, however I was easily influenced into buying the midnight cream.  I dont love it, the smell is very perfumey and it doesn't feel as hydrating as the Revitalift.  I will use it since I bought if but unless I see a major difference in my skin, Im going back to old faithful.

reviews.headline: The BEST
reviews.comments: I did a search for best night creams and this was the best pick for the price point (drug store brands) so I went out and bought it. The cream came with a sample of the serum and  after I used that I went out and bought it AND the eye cream. This is my nightly ritual and over the last two weeks I've seen SO much change in my 46 year old face! I've been using various potions and lotions over the years, even the prestige brands and this is truly the best night cream so far.

reviews.headline: Strong scent
reviews.comments: The moisturizer itself feels great, not too thick or sticky, but the unnecessary, strong floral scent gave me a headache! Returned it immediately

reviews.headline: Love the way it feels, hate the way it smells
reviews.comments: I was looking for a less expensive night cream that would help make my regular and more expensive moisturizer (Tatcha) last longer so I tried this after seeing several positive reviews. I definitely like the way it feels and the texture is great for a night cream. However, I cannot get past the strong smell. It smells like perfume, and its incredibly distracting. Unfortunately, I will be returning this.

reviews.headline: Rich and creamy
reviews.comments: I love how rich and creamy it feels and how it moisturizes my skin. I love that when I wake up in the morning it still feels soft and hydrated. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I didn't notice any difference  in the look of my skin.

reviews.headline: The smell
reviews.comments: Product felt good on my skin but due to the smell I had to wash it off. The smell does not go away. If you or your skin is sensitive to perfume smells skip this product. Please make an unscented version.

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing- without being too much!
reviews.comments: I decided to spend a little more on this instead of my current generic brand. It was worth it. My skin stays moisturized and has a more hydrated look, considering my skin is on the more mature side (age 50).

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Within 7 days, my face felt bumpy and awful. Returned it and went back to my usual Clinique and I'm all good.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I noticed a difference in my skin within a couple days.

reviews.headline: Wonderful, But You Get Cheated
reviews.comments: The is a wonderful and luxurious moisturizer. But, every jar is missing about 1/3 of the product due to a gaping air bubble. This has been the case in all three jars I've purchased, and I've seen a number of reviews on different platforms to the same effect. Love it, but not going to pay that price to be cheated out of product.

reviews.headline: Feels nice and smells horrible
reviews.comments: I purchased this after hearing so many raves about this product. The product itself feels nice on the skin, but my biggest issue is with the smell of this product. The smell is fishy and is overall very unpleasant.

reviews.headline: Wonder product
reviews.comments:
Sample #giftedbyLorealParis. 
Used this for 3 nights and woke up wach day with wonderfully plump and hydrated skin! 
It had a faint smell that went away after I put it on. 
Felt the difference so Immediately purchased for sister.

faceoff_positive.comments:
If you think you may have or are on your way to destroying your skins natural barrier from over exfoliating or harsh acids, this is definitely the cream you need to get your skin back in tip-top shape! Also, don't forget to cream your necks! This is the perfect formula for nighttime repairing and nourishment. 

I've been using the L'Oreal Paris Midnight Cream for the past few weeks and it is one of the most silky, emollient, luxurious feeling creams I've ever used. It feels amazing gliding on however, keep in mind this is a very rich night cream and as much as you will want to bathe in it, overdoing it can potentially clog your pores. 

Normally I have very dry skin, especially in the colder months and this antioxidant filled night cream will be my barrier maintenance go-to. Instantly my skin feels nourished and hydrated as the cream sinks in and is beaming by morning. My face looks healthier, more radiant, and I even notice the skin along my jawline getting firmer. My fine lines completely disappear after application and are looking more smoothed out and skin plumper every day. The deeper wrinkles between my brows are softening with speed,  especially when combined with L'Oreal's Revitalift 1.5% Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum. I have even seen improvement in my skins texture and skintone. 

As much as I enjoy this night cream and will continue to use it, I just want to reiterate that this is a very rich formula meant to repair and restore your skins resilience and barrier and I have noticed a couple pores getting clogged if I overdo it. Now, I can't be 100% that it was this creams fault as the little whiteheads were confined to the one spot that if I'm going to have a breakout, that's where it's going to be. So, it could have been a fluke as the rest of my  face has experienced nothing but beautiful, glowing, healthy, hydrated looking skin however, just to be on the safe side I wanted to make a note of it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Luxury

faceoff_negative.comments: I used L'OrÃ©al Paris Midnight Cream for two weeks.  There wasn't any noticeable difference on deep wrinkles. Dry patches I had on my skin were diminished. My skin tone is more even. I didn't have to use a lot ,as the cream is really thick and concentrated. There was very little fragrance  that I could detect. The jar I received wasn't completely full. I have added a photo of what my jar looked like after I removed the safety seal. I have other creams that work the same way. I probably won't purchase more when it's gone.  As I would expect to get a full product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice cream low fragrance
